name: Fossilized Hatchling
rules: Play only if you have four or more allies in your graveyard.
flavour: He's a pretty good pet. Since he's a skeleton, he doesnt's eat much.

name: Fossilized Raptor
rules: You pay 1 less to complete quests for each ally in your graveyard.;(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)
flavour: When you finished assembling this skeleton through some eldritch magic, the creature sprang back to life.

name: The Innkeeper's Daughter
rules: This item enters play with a hearth counter on it for each damage on your hero.;On your turn: [Exhaust], Remove all hearth counters from this item and destroy it -> Damage on your hero becomes equal to the number of hearth counters removed this way.

name: Puzzle Box of Yogg-Saron
rules: Players play with the top card of their decks revealed.;At the start of each player's turn, if the top card of this deck is a master hero, ability, ally, or equipment, he may play it without playing its cost.;[Exhaust] -> Shuffle target player's deck.

name: Wisp Amulet
rules: When a non-token ally in your party is destroyed, put a 0 [Nature] / 1 [Health] Wisp token into play.;Wisps you control have Harmonize.

name: Nifflevar Bearded Axe
rules: When your hero deals damage with this weapon, you pay 4 less to complete your next quest this turn.
